item.title: Billionaires are spending big to stop Zohran Mamdani's NYC mayoral bid
item.description: Bill Ackman, Ronald Lauder, William Lauder, Barry Diller and Dan Loeb have all made large donations to stop Mamdani. So have several non-New Yorkers.

item.title: NYC mayoral race raises over $40M
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank reports on news regarding New York City's mayoral race.

item.title: Billionaires vs. Zohran Mamdani: Here's what to know
item.description: Early voting is underway in the race for New York City Mayor, and some billionaires and companies are spending millions to defeat Zohran Mamdani. CNBC...

item.title: Trump's 39% tariffs 'horrible' for Switzerland, Breitling CEO says
item.description: Breitling CEO Georges Kern said that the U.S. tariffs were 'terrible news' for Switzerland.

item.title: One in three Manhattan condo owners lost money when they sold in the last year
item.description: Manhattan is still among the most expensive markets in the country, especially on a per-square-foot basis.
